section_title: LULUCF GOOD PRACTICE UNDER PROTOCOL ARTICLE 3.3 AND 3.4:
sentences: This issue was addressed briefly in plenary on 4 June, and then in informal SBSTA consultations co-facilitated by Anke Herold (European Community), and Nagmeldin Elhassan (Sudan).

The consultations considered equations underpinning the tables for reporting supplementary information to annual greenhouse gas inventory information for activities under Protocol Article 3.3 and 3.4.
After detailed and lengthy technical discussions, parties agreed on the equations, and the SBSTA adopted conclusions on 13 June.
enb_long_title: Twenty-eighth Sessions of the UNFCCC Subsidiary Bodies, Second Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Convention, and fifth Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Kyoto Protocol
